data.message: Amen! I have 3 best friends snd they're spread out and reside in Turkey, in UCity and Dripping Springs...I can call or txt ar any given time and they would answer!!! We don't have to talk everyday, but when we need one another we are THERE! That's a BFF situation right there!!! 2 I have known for 14 yrs and one for 9 months!!! Thanj you girls for being there for me! You know who you are!

replies.message: That's wonderful, Esther! Thank you for sharing with us. -Jenny
